*******************************************************************
This effectively exhausts the list. So, when calling the Value property after calling Clear, when RefreshMode has the RefreshMode.ListExhausted flag set, will cause the list automatically call Refresh().
Clears all valid and invalid URLs

member.summary: Resets all items in the binding cache

member.summary: Rebuilds of the list based off of the same find

members.member:
*******************************************************************
Move the cursor for the collection to the next item for RoundRobin mode. If we come to the end of the list, the index will be set to 0 and true will be returned.
bool indicating success *******************************************************************

*******************************************************************
Fires the ListExhausted event. Note to implementers, if you override this method, be sure to call the base method.
*******************************************************************
Resets all items in the binding Cache. This means that all the original Bindings will now be available for use agian. You should aquire a writer lock before calling this method.
Rebuilds the list of Access Points used. It will reprocess the find entirely. This means that the current list of urls could potentialy change during this operation.
Clears all items from the list. You should aquire a writer lock before calling this method.

*******************************************************************
Processes a FindService Message. Each binding that matches the search criteria will be added to the list. NOTE: If tModelKeys are provided in the Find Message, only bindings that implement an InstanceInfo for the specified keys will be added to the list.
FindService Message to send.
bool indicated that services were found. NOTE: This does not include any reduction logic for Hosting Redirectors or duplicates. *******************************************************************

*******************************************************************
Perform Reduction Logic on the the current list of bindings.
Any bindings that contain HostingRedirectors will be replaced with the refrenced binding. If the binding is already in the list, we will not add the entry.
*******************************************************************

*******************************************************************
Performs a sort of the BindingTemplate collection based off of the tModel Key provided in the SortByTModelKey property. Any Service that is categorized with that key will have a higher persidence than services that do not. So, for each binding in the list, if the parent service of that binding is "perfered", all bindings in the list that belong to that service, will be added to the list first. All remaining bindings will be added to the end of the list.
The unsorted list of bindingTemplates.
A Sorted and Summarized list of the original binding templates that were provied.
*******************************************************************

members.member: ResourceManager used to hold and manage localized strings.

static CTor.
If VSBUILD is defined, it will load the resources using the FQ Path. else it will use the base name.
NOTES: VSBUILD is defined in the VS Project, but not in the NT BUILD environment.
To make this function in VS, you will need to compile the string.txt file into a strings.resources file using resgen.exe. Place the compiled file in resources\1033. Add this file to the project and compile. You should get the a copy of the dll that has valid string resources.
